description.raw:
I've included multiple joint test and bug fixes in this pull request; sorry if that makes it difficult to follow.

1. Fix BulletSliderJoint::[GS]etVelocity. It wasn't working previously, so portions of joint_spawn.cc and 494_joint_axis_frame.cc were disabled. I have re-enabled these parts of the tests for prismatic joints. Thanks to @caguero for the patch to fix this, submitted a little while ago.

2. Fix BulletUniversalJoint limits. The limits were not being initialized properly from the sdf values. To verify this, I added some expectations to joint_universal.cc and modified the universal_joint_test.world slightly (build 963b29a5a1dd to verify the failing test). I believe this change to the test world doesn't compromise the other tests.

3. Enable joint axis frame testing for prismatic and universal joints (see changes to 494_joint_axis_frame.cc). This required fixes for ODEUniversalJoint::SetAxis and SimbodySliderJoint::GetGlobalAxis.

I found these while working on vehicle suspension modeling.

[Jenkins auto-build](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-devel-precise-amd64-gpu-nvidia/23/) as of a980263: clean apart from pr2 test failure (#1167) that will be fixed by pull request #1078
